educations.schoolName: The Chicago School of Professional Psychology at Washington DC

headline: Enhancing the Mission with Diversity & Inclusion Strategy
summary: Over 20 years of experience related to the workforce from previous positions held in Diversity, Human Resources, and Equal Employment Opportunity. My unique body of knowledge in these areas has provided me with a foundation that helps shape inclusive cultures that value individuals for the diversity of perspectives, abilities, and backgrounds they bring to an organization. With proven leadership abilities, political savvy, and demonstrated success for obtaining results, I continue to utilize my background to lead and foster inclusive environments.

defaultPosition.description: Guides systemic and attitudinal change in the organization through collaboration with agency leadership, stakeholders, and employees. positions.title: Chief Diversity Officer

positions.companyName: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives
positions.description: Serve as the principle advisor to the Director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives  and his executive staff on diversity and inclusion matters. I advance diversity and inclusion as core values and further strategic human capital objectives through an intersection of common goals around the ATF mission.
positions.title: Chief, Office of Diversity & Inclusion

positions.description: Developed and implemented EEO & Diversity policies and procedures to further the goals of equal employment opportunity within a bureau of approximately 5,000 employees.
positions.title: Chief, EEO & Diversity

positions.description: Developed and implemented EEO & Diversity policies and procedures to further the goals of equal employment opportunity within a bureau of approximately 800 employees.
positions.title: EEO Officer

positions.description: Assessed formal complaints and provided guidance, advice, and assistance by interpreting applicable civil rights laws and federal regulations.
positions.title: EEO Specialist
